revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Payapa |image = [[File:Payapa.png]] |caption = This Berry is said to sense human emotions for the way it swells roundly when a person approaches. The same behavior affects nearby plants, causing additional mutations. |growtime = 9h 30m 0s |harvest = 30 berries |replant = 5% |points = 1,900 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *15 sour }} '''Payapa''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Wiki]], at least 1 [[Bluk]], at least 1 [[Cornn]] and at least 1 [[Pamtre]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 18 mins || 3 hours 18 mins || 6 hours 30 mins || 9 hours 30 mins - 19 hours |- ! Animation |
